wybug_title: 红联Linux门户主站注射一枚
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-13：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-07-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  URL:http://www.linuxdiyf.com/viewthread.php?tid=276020&extra=page%253D&page=1Discuz! info: MySQL Query ErrorTime: 2014-6-13 12:12amScript: /viewthread.phpSQL: SELECT type FROM cdb_0usergroups WHERE groupid='7'Error: Table 'linuxdiyf.cdb_0usergroups' doesn't existErrno.: 1146Similar error report has beed dispatched to administrator before.   漏洞证明：  URL:http://www.linuxdiyf.com/viewthread.php?tid=276020&extra=page%253D&page=1Discuz! info: MySQL Query ErrorTime: 2014-6-13 12:12amScript: /viewthread.phpSQL: SELECT type FROM cdb_0usergroups WHERE groupid='7'Error: Table 'linuxdiyf.cdb_0usergroups' doesn't existErrno.: 1146Similar error report has beed dispatched to administrator before.   修复方案：  you know.   版权声明：转载请注明来源 懒懒滴1994@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
